item.title: 前新南威尔士银行行长乔丹认为，除非有必要，否则最好避免使用零利率
item.description: 瑞士国家银行前行长托马斯-乔丹（Thomas Jordan）表示，官员们不应排除恢复负利率的可能性，尽管这种措施最好避免。【原文：Former Swiss National Bank chief Thomas Jordan said officials shouldn’t rule out a return to negative interest rates, even though the measure is best avoided.】

item.title: 银行为 Novacap 的 Integral 广告债务交易寻求私人信贷
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，在与杠杆贷款投资者的接触无果后，华尔街银行正在寻求利用私人信贷，为 Novacap Investments Inc.【原文：Wall Street banks are looking to tap private credit to help finance Novacap Investments Inc.’s acquisition of Integral Ad Science Holding Corp. after an approach to leveraged loan investors fell flat, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 诺和诺德控股公司将出售 7.8% 的 Convatec 股份
item.description: 诺和诺德基金会（Novo Nordisk Foundation）旗下的诺和诺德控股公司（Novo Holdings A/S）将出售其在医疗技术公司康华特集团（Convatec Group Plc）7.8%的股份，从而退出其在康华特集团的剩余股份。【原文：Novo Holdings A/S, a vehicle for the Novo Nordisk Foundation, is set to exit its remaining position in medical technology firm Convatec Group Plc with a 7.8% stake sale.】

item.title: 特朗普关税推高消费者成本，全球最大铝生产商加价促销
item.description: 力拓集团正在对销往美国的铝货物征收附加费，此举有可能进一步扰乱已经因进口关税导致消费者成本上升而备受煎熬的北美市场。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is imposing surcharges on aluminum shipments it sells to the US, a move that threatens to further disrupt a North American market already roiled by import tariffs that are driving up costs for consumers.】

item.title: 英国考虑就钢铁关税问题报复欧洲的方案
item.description: 如果英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）无法达成一项协议来削弱欧盟提高钢铁关税的影响，那么英国正在制定针对欧盟提高钢铁关税提议的反制措施。【原文：The UK is drawing up countermeasures against the European Union’s proposed steel tariff increase in the event that Prime Minister Keir Starmer cannot secure a deal to blunt their impact.】

item.title: 人民币首席执行官认为非洲金融科技的崛起为大银行带来了机遇
item.description: 非洲市值最大的银行 FirstRand Ltd. 旗下兰德商业银行（Rand Merchant Bank）首席执行官表示，非洲金融科技公司的快速发展可以帮助传统贷款机构提高客户服务水平。【原文：The rapid advance of financial-technology companies in Africa could help traditional lenders enhance their customer service, said the chief executive officer of Rand Merchant Bank, a unit of FirstRand Ltd., Africa’s biggest bank by market capitalization.】

item.title: 尼日利亚与非洲的贸易因地区关系改善而增长 14
item.description: 尼日利亚海关总署署长表示，在政府加强地区联系之后，尼日利亚与其他非洲国家的贸易在今年上半年增长了 14%。【原文：Nigerian trade with other African nations grew 14% in the first half of the year, after the government strengthened regional ties, the country’s head of customs said.】

item.title: 德国默茨称欧洲银行业规则 "过于严格
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨与欧洲政界人士一道表示，该集团的银行业监管过于严格，因为美国让贷款人更容易获得经济融资。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz joined European politicians in saying the bloc’s banking regulations are too strict as the US gives lenders an easier ride to free up financing for the economy.】

item.title: 英国金融监管机构要求取消债券胶带暂停令
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）已向伦敦一家法院提出申请，要求允许解除对一项重要债券数据计划的暂停。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority has applied to a London court for permission to lift the suspension on a major bond data initiative.】

item.title: 通货膨胀和经济承受能力仍是一切
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 杰富瑞出售高达 12 亿美元的电力债务以获得私人信贷
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团正在为电力基础设施公司购买多达 12 亿美元的债务，以便将贷款从直接贷款人手中夺回。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. is shopping as much as $1.2 billion in debt for power infrastructure companies to take loans out of the hands of direct lenders, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 德意志银行加入巴克莱和阿波罗的行列，瞄准能源转型交易
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）增加了其与环境、社会和公司治理相关的融资目标，以高碳行业的交易为目标。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG increased its ESG-related financing goals to target deals in high-carbon sectors.】

item.title: Faire 开始出售价值 52 亿美元的员工股票，并计划首次公开募股
item.description: 在线市场 Faire 启动了部分员工以 52 亿美元估值出售公司股份的程序，此举使该公司离首次公开募股更近了一步。【原文：Online marketplace Faire has kicked off a process for some employees to sell their shares in the company at a $5.2 billion valuation, in a move that brings it closer to an initial public offering.】

item.title: 欧洲央行奇波罗内反对纯离线数字欧元
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波罗内（Piero Cipollone）说，要想充分享受电子货币带来的好处，需要一个在线和离线数字欧元。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone said an online and an offline digital euro would be needed to reap the full benefits of the electronic money.】

item.title: 南非顶级基金经理寻求主权基金合作伙伴
item.description: 南非最大的资金管理公司希望与领先的主权财富基金合作，在本土市场以外进行投资。【原文：South Africa’s biggest money manager wants to partner with leading sovereign wealth funds on investments outside its home market.】

item.title: 美国页岩油陷入低谷，加拿大油砂卷土重来
item.description: 在美国页岩油多年的阴影下，加拿大的油砂正在卷土重来。【原文：Canada’s oil sands are experiencing a comeback after years of living in the shadow of US shale.】

item.title: 梦幻体育赌博终结，银行为未售出贷款背黑锅
item.description: 华尔街在为一家由捷克亿万富翁支持的彩票公司提供 16.4 亿美元贷款，以资助亚特兰大一家梦幻体育运营商的多数股权上赌了一把— 也输了— 。【原文：Wall Street gambled — and lost — on a $1.64 billion loan for a lottery company backed by a Czech billionaire to fund a majority stake in a fantasy sports operator in Atlanta.】

item.title: 贝恩资本达成收购 Clearlake 旗下 Concert Golf 公司的交易
item.description: 收购公司贝恩资本正在从 Clearlake Capital 手中收购私人高尔夫俱乐部运营商 Concert Golf Partners。【原文：Buyout firm Bain Capital is acquiring private golf club operator Concert Golf Partners from Clearlake Capital.】

item.title: 美国奶牛饲养量激增预示牛肉短缺有所缓解
item.description: 美国的奶牛存栏量是至少四分之一世纪以来最大的，这是一个积极的迹象，因为肉类行业正面临供应紧张的问题，消费者面临创纪录的牛肉价格。【原文：The US milk cow herd is the biggest it has been in at least a quarter century, in a positive sign as the meat industry suffers through tight supplies and consumers face record beef prices.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称企业定价指向 "上行 "通胀风险
item.description: 英格兰银行决策者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）警告说，企业正在继续对高企的通胀水平做出反应，这表明利率制定者在降低经济中的价格压力方面不能放松。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann warned businesses are continuing to react to elevated levels of inflation, a sign that rate-setters cannot afford to relax in their battle to bring down price pressures in the economy.】

item.title: DeepMind 最新人工智能天气模型瞄准能源交易商
item.description: 谷歌 DeepMind 发布了一个新的人工智能天气模型，并称该模型比之前建立的任何模型都更快、更准确，同时还为能源交易商提供了更多工具。【原文：Google DeepMind has released a new artificial intelligence weather model that it says is faster and more accurate than anything it’s built before, while providing additional tools for energy traders.】

item.title: 英伟达业绩和经济数据大增前，标准普尔500指数波动剧烈
item.description: 周一，美国股市在小幅上涨和下跌之间徘徊，拉开了本周的序幕，本周将有人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）发布财报，并有拖延已久的经济数据公布。【原文：US stocks shuffled between small gains and losses on Monday, kicking off a packed week that will include earnings results from artificial-intelligence darling Nvidia Corp. and the release of long-delayed economic data.】

item.title: 欧盟考虑将科技巨头纳入 DMA，科技巨头的云计算能力受到质疑
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）、微软公司（Microsoft Corp.【原文：Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Corp.’s Azure, and Alphabet Inc.’s Google Cloud risk being dragged into the scope of the European Union’s crackdown on Big Tech as antitrust watchdogs prepare to study the platforms’ market power.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊认为就业下行风险增加
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）周一表示，他认为就业面临的下行风险增加，但他重申了自己的观点，即随着利率接近中性，政策制定者需要缓慢行事。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair Philip Jefferson on Monday said he sees increased downside risks to employment, though repeated his view that policymakers need to proceed slowly as interest rates approach neutral.】

item.title: CD&R 拟以 79 亿美元跨境交易收购希悦尔公司
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Bank of America Corp. are among a group of banks involved in a $7.9 billion cross-border debt financing backing Clayton Dubilier & Rice’s acquisition of Sealed Air, the packaging company best known for creating Bubble Wrap.】

item.title: 美国和俄罗斯隐形战斗机在迪拜航展上一决高下
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin Corp.）的 F-35 和俄罗斯联合飞机公司（Russian United Aircraft Corp.【原文：Lockheed Martin Corp.’s F-35 and the Russian United Aircraft Corp.’s Su-57E stealth fighter competed for Mideast defense budgets Monday in a rare flying display at the Dubai Airshow.】

item.title: 安全风险扰乱计划，谷歌和 Meta 推迟红海电缆项目
item.description: 计划穿越红海的多条海底互联网电缆尚未按计划完工，因为政治紧张局势和安全威胁的加剧使这条线路对商船来说更加危险和复杂。【原文：Multiple subsea internet cables slated to run through the Red Sea are yet to complete as planned, as political tensions and heightened security threats have made the route more dangerous and complicated for commercial vessels.】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省 2,100 亿美元养老金开始量子验证
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省投资管理公司是一家管理着 2,950 亿加元（2,100 亿美元）资产的养老基金，该公司正在加紧准备，以应对量子计算世界带来的回报和巨大风险。【原文：British Columbia Investment Management Corp., a pension fund managing C$295 billion ($210 billion) in assets, is stepping up preparations for the rewards and great risks of a world with quantum computing.】

item.title: 回报乏善可陈，等待首次公开募股的美国公司前景黯淡
item.description: 本月美国股市的回落对首次公开募股的打击尤为严重，这对那些仍希望在今年剩余时间内上市的公司来说无疑是雪上加霜。【原文：The pullback in the US stock market this month is hitting initial public offerings disproportionately hard, a further complication for companies still looking to go public in the remainder of the year.】

item.title: 福特与亚马逊合作，让消费者在线购买其二手车
item.description: 福特汽车公司已与亚马逊公司达成协议，通过其电子商务网站销售认证二手车，成为第二家通过大型在线零售商接触客户的主要汽车制造商。【原文：Ford Motor Co. has struck a deal with Amazon.com Inc. to sell certified used cars through its e-commerce website, becoming the second major automaker to reach customers through the massive online retailer.】
